Slight adjustment to lowercase province and region. Changed the error message for "no entry" to align with standards and be more relevant for U.S. audiences.

column11: Enter a postal code that meets your country’s requirements. If your country doesn’t require a postal code, enter NA.

column13: Enter a valid 5- or 9-digit zip code
column15: Slight adjustment to make zip lowercase. And include "5- or 9-digit" when user has indicated that they live in the U.S.

column9: Select a type of post office: APO, FPO, or DPO
